title: Spalding Mens Active Performance Athletic Workout Shorts Gym Clothes Shorts with 10 inch Inseam
feature: PERFECT WORKOUT COMPANION: Whether you’re running, playing sports, or lifting, feel free to move and perform at your best with this pair of shorts that allows a light and carefree movement during your most intense activities. What's more, it also features a reflective Spalding logo for added safety as it keeps you visible at night
SNUG AND COZY FIT: These active shorts feature an 10-inch inseam and elastic waistband with inside draw cord that cinches to your perfect athletic fit without restricting movements
STAY COOL AND DRY: These polyester-made shorts feature moisture-wicking properties for a dry, cool, and comfortable feeling even when you heat up during extreme workouts
KEEP SMALL ESSENTIALS HANDY: Have a convenient storage of your necessities with the two side seam pockets that provide ample room for your locker key, cellphone, wallet, and other belongings

FUSS-FREE MAINTENANCE: We’ve made these shorts with active guys in mind so it’s an easy fit and easy to care for bottoms. It is non-shrinking, fade-resistant, machine-washable, and quick to dry. Slip these on with the confidence of knowing they'll be good
description: Gear up for game time in these lightweight training shorts. Engineered with a relaxed fit and comfortable materials, these shorts are equipped to help you maximize your performance on the field, in the gym or in the court.
